Summary: i am a multiple abductee, this happened when i was six years old and in dec/2005 both
divs: Sighting Detailswhen i was six years old i was sleeping and at around 2-3 am i saw myself laying in bed even though i was floating in the corner of the room. at some point i was physically able to move in bed, went to my window and looked outside and there was a craft outside landed on the front lawn. there were prominant lights. i tried but could make no noise. then with the ramp to the vehicle down an animal of some type exited and then there was this horrific scream like a wild boar. after that the vehicle went dark or disappeared. the next morning i went to wake up my dad and told him i needed him to come downstairs that something had happened. i told him what had happened and that there was some type of animal dead outside. we went outside and found what looked like a kind of wild boar and it had a wound that was like a slice by a laser type but the dead animal was full of maggots inside and out and thats impossible for the duration it was dead. my father buried it with me. when i was floating in the corner of the room i was coming back from being abducted and i had an implant put in the back of my neck. the movie communion almost exactly depicts what i went through then. then in december 28 2005 i had my second alien encounter. it was after 300am and there were lots of bright lights coming through my windows all around the house. there were strange noises coming from whom i did not understand who or what but the noises made no sense. i got real scared. turned off the small amount of light i had on. went into the bathroom turned around and ran into one of them. i didnt see the entity but i know what i ran into me and it scared the hell out of me. went back to the couch and called my dad in florida at around 320am. talked to him then during the call some kind of electrical stimulation started happening to my center of my back. i was screaming on the phone to my dad telling him they were hurting me. the pain was intense. while this was going on i saw a square headed shaped entity crouched down near my table against the wall starring at me. it had a whiteish tint and i know i can be of help scetching this out with an artist. my implant bothered me for years. i am the real article and would like to be taken seriously. i have been seeing dr. douglas ruben, phd in okemos and have no psychological disorder but see him for communication. after six and a half years he finally sided with me, is getting me a hypnotyist, gave me your website and prior to lately all these years this topic was off limits even though i talked about proff with the movie communion and other proofv i have. please take me seriously , i will pass all your testing modalities and gettin my story out there means everything to me, so does having one more of these encounters with these beings cause im ready and its going to be different next time.
